text: Kayamkulam Kanaran is a 2002 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Nissar, starring Sarath Haridas and Madhupal in the lead role. http://spicyonion.com/title/kayamkulam-kanaran-malayalam-movie/ ==Cast== * Kottayam Nazeer * Kalabhavan Shajon * Indrans * Prajod Kalabhavan * Janardhanan * Madhupal * Beena Antony * Kannur Sreelatha * MR Gopakumar * Mala Aravindan * Sarath Haridas * Seetha (Devaasuram) ==References== ==External links== * Category:2002 films Category:Indian films Category:2000s Malayalam- language films
title: Kayamkulam Kanaran
